getFileFromPathList

public static File getFileFromPathList(String fileNameWithNoPath,
                                       String[] pathList)
This function returns the file object of the first location in which the requested file is found.

Parameters:
fileNameWithNoPath - The file name (with no directory path)
pathList - The path list
Returns:
The file object if found, else null will be returned

getFileFromNativePath

public static File getFileFromNativePath(String fileNameWithNoPath)
This function returns the file object of the first location in which the requested file is found. The path list used, is the current native path of the process.

Parameters:
fileNameWithNoPath - The file name (with no directory path)
Returns:
The file object if found, else null will be returned
